sentences.en: Character: The tan powdery pellet and the colorless transparent watery solution, has the special fetid odor slightly.
sentences.cn: 性状: 本品为近似澄清的粘性液体 、 稍具特异臭味.

sentences.en: STREAM of foreigners trickles in and usually out, of the fetid jails of Bangkok.
sentences.cn: 虽然出入于恶臭的泰国曼谷监狱的外国人形形色色, 络绎不绝.

sentences.en: The air of the room was fetid with stale tobacco smoke.
sentences.cn: 房间里的空气有陈烟的臭味.

sentences.en: the black fetid water of the lake
The center of our city is nothing more than broken boulders and fetid ponds.
sentences.cn: 他对着广场上围绕着他们的人群做了个手势,然后对他们说道.

sentences.en: The fetid odour sickened the hospital workers.
sentences.cn: 恶臭的气味令医院工作人员作呕。

sentences.en: This has the water absorbability, the absorption carbon dioxide emits the amine fetid odor.
sentences.cn: 本品有吸湿性, 吸收二氧化碳放出胺臭味.
